DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether acute aerobic exercise versus resistance exercise effects cognitive function among older adults.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Acute Exercise on Cognitive Functions
DOC.criteria: Exercise at least 2 times a week Able to sign informed consent Able to perform ergometric exam Above 40 years old Smoking Suffering psychiatric or neurologic illness No medication for chronic illness that could effect cognitive function Problems with cognitive functioning after head trauma Longterm hospitalization within the past 3 months Inability to use computer because of vision or motor problems Pregnancy
